templates.name: Problem-Solution
templates.description: Generate ideas based on identifying and solving specific problems
prompts: What's a recurring problem in {industry} that technology could solve?
How could we eliminate the biggest friction point in {process}?
What manual task in {domain} is begging for automation?
What problem do {target_audience} face that they don't even realize?
How could we turn {current_pain_point} into a competitive advantage?

templates.name: Trend Intersection
templates.description: Combine multiple trends or technologies for innovative solutions
prompts: How could {trend1} be combined with {trend2} to create something new?
What happens when we apply {technology} to {traditional_industry}?
How could {consumer_behavior_change} create opportunities in {market}?
What if we merged {service_type1} with {service_type2}?
How could {emerging_tech} disrupt {established_process}?

templates.name: User Experience Focus
templates.description: Ideas centered around improving user experience and interaction
prompts: How could we make {complex_process} as simple as one click?
What would {service} look like if designed for {specific_user_group}?
How could we eliminate all the annoying parts of {user_journey}?
What if {traditional_interaction} was completely reimagined?
How could we make {expertise} accessible to complete beginners?

templates.name: Business Model Innovation
templates.description: Explore new ways to create, deliver, and capture value
prompts: What if {industry} moved from ownership to subscription model?
How could we create a marketplace for {underutilized_resource}?
What would a platform business look like in {traditional_sector}?
How could we turn {cost_center} into a revenue generator?
What if customers could {participate_in_value_creation}?

templates.name: Constraint Removal
templates.description: Ideas that challenge existing limitations and constraints
prompts: What would be possible if {current_constraint} didn't exist?
How could we work around the limitation of {resource_scarcity}?
What if {expensive_thing} became incredibly cheap?
How could we bypass {traditional_gatekeeper}?
What would change if {physical_limitation} was removed?

templates.name: Community & Social
templates.description: Leverage social interactions and community dynamics
prompts: How could we turn {individual_activity} into a social experience?
What kind of community could form around {shared_interest}?
How could peer-to-peer dynamics improve {service}?
What would happen if we gamified {mundane_task}?
How could we connect people who share {specific_challenge}?

templates.name: Data & Insights
templates.description: Generate value from data analysis and insights
prompts: What insights could we extract from {underutilized_data_source}?
How could we predict {important_outcome} before it happens?
What patterns in {behavior_type} could inform better {decisions}?
How could we visualize {complex_information} for better understanding?
What would personalized {recommendation_type} look like?

templates.name: Sustainability & Impact
templates.description: Focus on environmental and social impact solutions
prompts: How could we make {industry} more environmentally sustainable?
What circular economy opportunity exists in {waste_stream}?
How could technology help people reduce their {environmental_impact}?
What social problem could be solved with {approach}?
How could we measure and improve {impact_metric}?

templates.name: Micro-Niche Focus
templates.description: Highly specific solutions for very particular audiences
prompts: What tool would be perfect for {very_specific_user_group}?
How could we solve the unique problem of {niche_scenario}?
What would {general_solution} look like optimized for {specific_constraint}?
How could we serve the overlooked needs of {underserved_segment}?
What micro-optimization could make a huge difference in {specific_workflow}?

templates.name: Future Speculation
templates.description: Explore possibilities for future scenarios and changes
prompts: What will people need when {future_scenario} becomes reality?
How should we prepare for the world where {trend} is dominant?
What infrastructure will be needed for {emerging_capability}?
How could we get ahead of {anticipated_change}?
What opportunity will emerge from {future_challenge}?
